text: Egha aning Atalian ikegha kurim inigha uamategha Antioghɨn nguibamɨn ghu. Nguibar kamra, aning kagh faragha ikezɨ, Antioghɨn itir Kraisɨn adarasi aning isava Godɨn agharim ganɨnga ghaze, Godɨn apangkuvim aning ko ikɨtɨ aning ingangarir kam damuam. Ezɨ aning ingangarir kam gamua iza datɨrɨghɨn anegɨfa. Egha aning uamategha Antioghɨn ghu.
